So you should call before going down.He charges flat rate of $100 or $110 and it is pretty comprehensive from PATHLAB.I've been going to him for the past 5 years.0 comments0

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 15 Jan 2019You can check local polyclinics or the major hospitals, most if not all will have a package for screening. With your budget, you can add on alot of tests. No specific hospital to recommend as I dont think there is best hospital screening.0 comments0
